name: Chawie's Quest
description:
Synopsis: The Chaw are the most peaceful people in the universe, and they know how to befriend everyone. However, not everyone is like Chaw, and something is bothering the lives of these peaceful creatures. Chawie, the little Chaw, is designated to retrieve an item that may solve this problem...

Instructions: Z key to jump. Jump over the Fungi a certain number of times to stun them. While they are stunned, press X to give them a Biscoin (if you have at least one) and maybe you will make him Chawie's friend! Up arrow to talk to NPCs, including befriended enemies.

This is a very short game. Due to time restrictions (the GBJam 5), it tells only the very beginning of this history, and shows only the most basic mechanics. The development started during the GBJam 5 submission period. I plan on continue developing this game, as I had a lot of fun while making it.

If you like this game, please let me know! :)

Credits:

Everything: Vinicius Osti

WARNING: this demo may run slowly on some PCs. I'm working on it now.
